cause.description:
The Avon Walk for Breast Cancer is the The Avon Foundation for Women’s largest annual fundraising initiative. This series of nine Walks, held from April to October, raises extraordinary awareness as participants spend an entire weekend walking 39 miles through cities and towns around the country. From 2003 through 2009, the Avon Walks have raised more than $320 million - - funds that are directly saving lives. In 2009 alone, hundreds of thousands of donors supported more than 21,000 Walkers and Crew who participated. For more information visit http://www.avonwalk.org
1. Advance access to care
2. Find a cure for breast cancer with a focus on the medically underserved
cause.mission: help men and women discover breast cancer earlier and fund prevention programs.
cause.name: Avon Breast Cancer Crusade
